動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克豬嗜血桿菌不活化菌苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防豬嗜血桿菌性胸膜肺炎。
ingredients: AT LEAST 75 X 10^9 CFU OF INACTIVATED AND ALUMINIUMHYDROXIDE ADJUVANTED STRAINS (1,5,7) OF ACTINOBACILLUSPLEUROPNEUMONIAE MOST FREQUENTLY ASSOCIATED WITH SWINEINFECTIOUS PLEUROPNEUMONIA.
